content:
Hello, my droplet started working intermittently since saturday. I am unable to pinpoint the exact issue. I thought It was a DNS issue, as I changed the DNS of the TLD, but the only change was in the old domain and not the digital ocean droplet. The CNAME was updated to reflect the previous settings. Any help or guidance would be greatly appreciated. Currently, does not work at all. zu.the101project.com
the droplet ip is 161.35.6.144
@George Curtis: When you say "intermittently" -- what is the failure mode when it's not working?
well, I am an idiot. I created a CNAME DNS entry instead of an A record Entry. Corrected the rookie mistake and now it is working.
Alex Vandiver has marked this topic as resolved.
